## Checklist

- [ ] This change follows the process in `docs/standards/hcs-4.md`
- [ ] I used RFC 2119 language (MUST/SHOULD/MAY) for normative requirements
- [ ] The spec includes Status and Version
- [ ] The spec includes Backwards Compatibility / Migration guidance
- [ ] The spec includes Security Considerations (and Privacy Considerations if applicable)
- [ ] The spec includes Conformance requirements (what implementations MUST/SHOULD do)
- [ ] The spec includes a License section stating Apache-2.0
- [ ] If proposing publication, I included a Governance Record (PASS reference)
- [ ] I did not include secrets or private keys
